Robert Hock | top_scorer_link = | playoffs = | playoffs_link = | conf1 = | conf1_link = | conf1_champ = | conf1-runner-up = | conf2 = | conf2_link = | conf2_champ = | conf2-runner-up = | finals = Finals | finals_link = | finals_champ = EisbÃ¤ren Berlin | finals-runner-up = | finals_MVP = | finals_MVP_link = | seasonslist = Deutsche Eishockey Liga#DEL seasons | seasonslistnames = DEL | prevseason_link = 2007-08 Deutsche Eishockey Liga season | prevseason_year = 2007â08 | nextseason_link = 2009â10 Deutsche Eishockey Liga season | nextseason_year = 2009â10 }} The '''2008â09 Deutsche Eishockey Liga season''' was the 15th season since the founding of the [[Deutsche Eishockey Liga]] ({{lang-en|German Ice Hockey Leagie}}). 16 Teams played after the [[2nd Bundesliga (ice hockey)|2. Bundesliga]] Champion, the [[Kassel Huskies]] received the license to play in the DEL. After 52 rounds and the play-off's, the [[EisbÃ¤ren Berlin]] won its 4th German Championship in the last five years. ==Teams== {{ Location map+ | Germany | width=300 | float=right | caption= Teams of Grizzly Adams|Wolfsburg Grizzly Adams]]''' |[[Wolfsburg]] |[[Eisarena Wolfsburg]] |align=right| 4.5 |align=right| 2,328 |align=right| 2,560 |- |} In accordance to the cooperation contract between the DEL and the [[Deutscher Eishockey-Bund|German Ice Hockey Federation]], and after concluding that necessary reforms where not done in the [[2nd Bundesliga (ice hockey)|2. Bundesliga]], a decision was made not to have playdowns and no teams were relegated. However, after ensuring compliance with the [[Deutsche Eishockey Liga#League regulations|DEL regulations]], the [[2nd Bundesliga (ice hockey)|2. Bundesliga]] Champions, the [[Kassel Huskies]], were allowed to enter the league on July 4, 2008[http://www.kicker.de/news/eishockey/startseite/artikel/380451/ GrÃ¼nes Licht fÃ¼r die Huskies], kicker.de (de), expanding the league to 16 teams. This is also the first season where the [[EisbÃ¤ren Berlin]] played in the brand new [[O2 World]] arena. The number of regular seasons rounds was reduced to 52 from 56 in the previous season. The 6-best placed teams qualified for the playoffs, the teams in 7-10th position where to play a qualification round. The average team budget was estimate at Euro â¬ 5.24 million, raising the league total to Euro â¬ 84.3 million from Euro â¬ 78.7, mainly due to the addition of 1 team. ==Regular season== {|
